name: Chamber no. 5
description:
A puzzle, or one last dance in your grave

Headphones recommended; inspired by this Famicase Exhibition entry by Jordan Persson: http://famicase.com/18/softs/101.html

Controls:

WASD to move, mouse to look, left-click to interact. (SPACE to jump and SHIFT to run if you'd like, but not necessary.) 

Update: made it a tiny bit easier to figure things out (though apologies to those who are colorblind); fixed the collider for something important so it shouldn't fall through the earth as much
